title: MACOM Technology Solutions Holdings, Inc. (NASDAQ:MTSI) Given Consensus Recommendation of “Moderate Buy” by Brokerages
text: MACOM Technology Solutions Holdings, Inc. (NASDAQ: MTSI - Get Free Report) has been given an average rating of "Moderate Buy" by the thirteen analysts that are presently covering the stock, Marketbeat reports. One analyst has rated the stock with a sell rating, one has assigned a hold rating, nine have issued a buy rating and two

title: M/A-Com (MTSI) Surges 13.0%: Is This an Indication of Further Gains?
text: M/A-Com (MTSI) was a big mover last session on higher-than-average trading volume. The latest trend in earnings estimate revisions might not help the stock continue moving higher in the near term.

title: This chip stock is surging. It may be a play on SpaceX's growth.
text: Macom Technology Solutions has called out various ways it can cash in on the boom in low-Earth-orbit satellites.

title: Overlooked Stock: MTSI All-Time High on AI Hopes, Bryan Ingram Hire
text: MACOM Technologies (MTSI) hit a record high as investors pay closer attention to the company's ties to the Department of Defense amid a push for higher U.S. defense spending. Not only that, but George Tsilis notes MACOM's thematic ties to the AI trade adding to a bull case.

title: Macom Stock Breaks Out On Satellite Business Prospects
text: Macom Technology Solutions stock surged to an all-time high on Monday amid rising expectations for its semiconductor products for satellite communications.
